title: N=2 String Loops and Spectral Flow
abstract: Based on our previous studies of the BRST cohomology of the critical N=2 strings, we construct the loop measure and make explicit the role of the spectral flow at arbitrary genus and Chern class, in a holomorphic field basis. The spectral flow operator attributes to the existence of the hidden `small' N=4 superconformal symmetry which is non-linearly realized. We also discuss the symmetry properties of N=2 string amplitudes on locally-flat backgrounds.
